QuestData.Title: The Eyes Have It
QuestData.Description: Very well then, $r. You have purchased my services in blood. Take me back to the "Low Shaman" of Thundermar.$B$BOh yes, I already know where you're taking me. Blundy's meager, ale-soaked abilities are trivial. But you - you fascinate me, $r. With my sight and your abilities, imagine the havoc we could unleash into this pathetic world together...
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Eye of Twilight to Low Shaman Blundy at Thundermar in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: You again? Wot? You bring me somethun'?
QuestData.RewardText: You found one? A gen-u-ine Eye of Twilight? Lemme see.$B$BOh Gods. It's lookin' at me. It's lookin' right back!$B$BI need a drink. Can you face that thing toward the wall or somethin'?
